descriptionHtml:
[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffffff]Based on on business contract,Belethor has becomed an dealer for famous painter from Cyrodiil,Faust.

Visit Belethor's store,and buy some beautifull paintings for your home.

In order to decorate your home you will need an mod which allows you to move statics.I personally recommend Jaxonx Positioner.
Also if you find paintings to big or to small you must use an console.Lower your console with console button,click on painting and use commands :Â 
modscale or setscale with numeral suffixes from -10 to 10 to scale your painting.[/color][/font]



[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][i][b]Credits :[/b][/i]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/46636153]CodeNamed1[/url] for original idea
Insanity for paintings textures[/font][/size]
author: ibrica_orahovac
